Name: Hydra
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with the Heads of the Hydra and Noxious Breath.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model with a Rend Characteristic of -2 or better are treated as having a Rend Characteristic of -1.

After an enemy Formation has finished resolving all their attacks against this model roll XD6 where X is the number of health this model lost because of that enemy Formation’s attacks. For each result of 2-3 this model improves its Attacks Characteristic by 1. For each result of 4-5 this model improves its Attacks Characteristic by 1 and regains 1 lost wound and for each result of 6 this model improves its Attacks Characteristic by 1 and regains 2 lost wounds. (If this model is reduced to 0 Health, this ability has no effect). This model cannot gain more than 10 additional attacks from this ability.
